attributes.action: Police intimidation and brutality in poor and black communities
attributes.additional_details:
In poor and black communities, police intimidation and brutality is common knowledge but never seems to be escalated to a public or political level.

The use of unnecessary force by a few bad officers breaks down the trust and communication between the police and community. I believe it is important for there to be an investigation into ALL claims of intimidation and brutality and for there to be a reform of the policing system.
